data.title: Fastenal eyes greater digital expansion in 2025
data.description: In 2024, digital sales accounted for approximately 62% of Fastenalâ€™s total revenue ($4.678 billion), demonstrating consistent progress. The company is targeting further growth, with plans to achieve 66% to 68% digital sales penetration by the end of 2025.

data.title: Prime Day 2024 drives record sales for overall US ecommerce
data.description: Amazon itself didn't specify how much it made in Prime Day 2024 sales, but its event led to online retail discounting across the industry.
